snippet: Supporters said the expansion would provide coverage to more than one million low-income residents and ease the burden on local taxpayers.
abstract: Hundreds of activists and uninsured Texans plan to rally at steps of State Capitol, increasing pressure on Gov Rick Perry and other Republican leaders to change their refusal to expand medicaid, major provision of Pres Obama's health care overhaul.
lead_paragraph: Supporters said the expansion would provide coverage to more than one million low-income residents and ease the burden on local taxpayers.

headline.seo: Texans Rebut Gov. Rick Perry After Rejection of Medicaid Expansion
headline.main: Texans Rebut Gov. Rick Perry on Expansion of Medicaid
headline.print_headline: Texans Rebut Governor On Expansion Of Medicaid
